name: Paths: Make Your Story Choices
description:
It seems that your plane has crashed on the island, but how? Why? Was it a random malfunction, or something more sinister? You discover the black box of the plane and find a recording with audio of a fight. It looks like someone on the plane sabotaged your flight, leading to a near-fatal ending...but who could it have been?

You'll grapple with drama, scandal and lust as you and your “friends” try to figure out who would want to hurt you all so badly that they'd risk everything. Was it your best friend? Your childhood crush? The sexy stranger? All will be revealed on your Paths journey.

What you’ll find on your Paths journey:

Customise your Character
Choose from stunning outfits and hairstyles to create a character that you LOVE.

Choose your own Path
Guide the story in the direction you choose, decide how you want to play the game.

Find Love
Who says you can’t save the world and find true love?
